+/- range direction: +/- range of the sun position for active sun protection
Automatic for children area: Type of automatic control for the children's area
Automatic for living area: Type of automatic control for the living area
Automatic for sleep area: Type of automatic control for the sleeping area
Automatic operation when trigger deviati: Use automatic control even when the window / door is open (lock-out protection)
Brightness value for down with lightsens: Brightness value for closing with light sensor
Brightness value for up with lightsensor: Brightness value for opening with light sensor
Drive by Trigger: Shutters move when the window / door status changes
DriveAfterClose: Drive to position after window has been closed
Enum Living Auto / Manu: Enumaration for living area auto / manual
Enum Sleep Auto / Manu: Enumeration for sleeping area auto / manual
First move to an intermediate position a: First move to an intermediate position and close later
Max Time for Driving up on the week: Latest time to drive up in the week
Max Time for Driving up on the weekend: Latest time to drive up at the weekend
Min Time for Driving up on the week: Earliest time to drive up in the week
Min Time for Driving up on the weekend: Earliest time to drive up on weekends
Name: Name
Object ID Actual value of the sun protec: Object ID of the outside temperature sensor
Object ID for Lightsensor: Object ID of the light sensor
Object ID for holiday today: Object ID for setting the vacation
Object ID of alarm Fire: Object ID to activate / deactivate fire alarm
Object ID of alarm Frost: Object ID to activate / deactivate frost alarm
Object ID of alarm Rain: Object ID to activate / deactivate rain alarm
Object ID of alarm wind 1: Object ID to activate / deactivate wind 1 alarm
Object ID of alarm wind 2: Object ID to activate / deactivate wind 2 alarm
Object ID of the Inside Temperature: Object ID of the inside temperature sensor
Object ID of the sun protection Lightsen: Object ID of the sun protection light sensor
Object ID of trigger for Auto Children: Object ID to activate / deactivate the children's area (e.g. presence detection)
Object ID of trigger for Auto Living: Object ID to activate / deactivate the living area (e.g. presence detection)
Object ID of trigger for Auto Sleep: Object ID to activate / deactivate the sleeping area (e.g. presence detection)
Object ID to activate / deactivate the s: Object ID to activate / deactivate the school holidays
Shut down on the week: Shutters close during the working week
State from Trigger: Value of the window / door sensor when closed
State from Trigger Tilted: Value of the window / door sensor when tilted
Sun Protect End with Elevation: End the sun protection with the height of the sun (elevation)
Time at which the roller shutters config: Time at which the shutters configured for this should close late
Time left to detect second sleep (minute: Open only when not moved for x (minutes)
Time to completely close the shutters fr: Time to completely close the shutters from the intermediate position
Trigger ID: Object ID of the window / door contact
Use schoolfree for Children Area: Use Schoolfree for the children's area
Use schoolfree for Sleep Area: Use Schoolfree for the sleeping area
Waiting time for checking the shutter st: Waiting time for checking the shutter status (seconds)
automatic children area time with Golden: Time of Children's area with golden hour
automatic children area time with sunris: Time of children's area with sunrise & sunset
automatic living area time with Golden h: Time of living area with golden hour
automatic living area time with sunrise: Time of living area with sunrise & sunset
automatic sleep area time with Golden ho: Time of sleeping area with golden hour
automatic sleep area time with sunrise a: Time of sleeping area with sunrise & sunset
close certain shutters later (the indivi: Close certain shutters later (the individual shutters must be activated in the shutter settings)
enableAlarmFire: Enable fire alarm for this shutter
enableAlarmFrost: Enable frost alarm for this shutter
enableAlarmRain: Enable rain alarm for this shutter
enableAlarmWind1: Enable wind 1 alarm for this shutter
enableAlarmWind2: Enable wind 2 alarm for this shutter
height for trigger: Shutter height when opening the window or door
height for trigger tildet: Shutter height when the window or door is tilted
in and outside temperature and direction: Inside / outside temperature / light sensor & compass direction
inSummerNotDown: Do not close shutters in summer
only children area time: Only the time for the children's area
only living area time: Only the time for living area
only sleep area time: Only the time for sleeping area
outside temperature and direction: Outside temperature / light sensor & compass direction
setpoint of the sun protection Lightsens: Setpoint of the sun protection light sensor
shutter height in the intermediate posit: Shutter height in the intermediate position
trigDelyDown: Delay shutter down when window is closed (seconds)
trigDelyUp: Delay shutter up when window is opened (seconds)
type down: Type of control for closing the shutter
type up: Type of control for opening the shutter
